original_text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.
korean_text: 우리에게 있는 대제사장은 우리의 연약함을 동정하지 못하실 이가 아니요 모든 일에 우리와 똑같이 시험을 받으신 이로되 죄는 없으시니라

sentences.original_text: For we have not an high priest
which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 연약함을 느끼지 못하시는 분이 아니요

sentences.original_text: but was in all points tempted like as we are
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 모든 점에서 우리와 같이 시험을 받으신 분이라
